Description: The defendant is sole director of Collier Homes Limited who were undertaking work at 61, Bennets Road, Horsham as a contractor to GMS Adaptations Limited. The IP was self-employed working for Collier Homes. An unsafe system of work was used for cutting timber to form the flat roof of a domestic ground floor extension, leading to the IP’s hands being in close proximity to a 240V powered circular saw. The saw blade made contact with his hand, amputating one finger and almost severing a second.
